title: unnaik-kATTuvAr
sahitya:
unnaik-kATTuvAr ulagil illaiyO uLLamtOrum uLLa vaLLarp-perumAnE


anupallavi

  ponnaik-kATTuvArkku minnuDal kATTuvAr peNNaik-kATTuvAr kaNNaik-kATTuvArgaL


caraNam    kaTra puttakakkattaik-kATTuvAr karpam kATTuvAr arputam kATTuvAr
shuTru manadaik-kaTTi vaittaDangi shuddhayOga samAdhistrAgi uLLE
